alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 8:42PM CST until January 22 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama... Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam affecting Clarke, Washington and Choctaw Counties. For the Tombigbee River...including Coffeeville Dam, Leroy...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Pastureland becomes flooded. Livestock should be moved to higher ground. Old Ferry Road near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 24.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday morning to a crest of 29.9 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
